title: Will the phone be locked if the graphic lock is input incorrectly several times in succession? If I forget how to unlocking pattern, can I unlock them through GMAIL Email?
answer:
The phone will give a prompt if you have entered the wrong graphic lock for several times in succession. It will not be locked but will delay the next attempt.

If you forget the pattern, please send it to the customer service department for unlocking or updating the version again. Gmail messages cannot be used to unlock this phone.
